posts.post_content:
If you're looking for a cheap OJ HOFer, you're in luck. This Clarkson has the ad cut off the bottom, but the image is great, nice and sharp. Asking $700 shipped, or best offer.
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/54017573627_95f949e45b_h.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/54018809639_ad9372ba93_k.jpg[/IMG]
